sentences.en: A limousine swept her along the busy freeway to the airport.
sentences.cn: 一辆豪华轿车载着她沿着拥挤的高速公路飞速驶向机场。

sentences.en: A limousine was sent to pick me up and deliver me to the set. Eat your heart out, Tom Selleck!
sentences.cn: 他们派了一辆豪华轿车来接我去片场，你就眼红吧，汤姆·塞立克！

sentences.en: A limousine whirred him away.
sentences.cn: 一辆轿车呼地一声把他载走.

sentences.en: a long black chauffeur-driven limousine
sentences.cn: 由专职司机驾驶的黑色豪华加长轿车

sentences.en: As the limousine slowly cruised to the nearby Imperial Hotel, the princess smiled and waved to thousands of well-wishers along the road.
sentences.cn: 豪华轿车缓缓驶向附近的帝国饭店，纪宫公主微笑着向马路两边成千上万的祝福者们挥手致意。

sentences.en: But a few blocks south, far away from the blare of Hummer limousine horns, at the fashionable opening of the Algus Greenspon Gallery on Morton Street, a more demure look prevailed.
sentences.cn: 不过就在隔了几个街区的南边，远离悍马豪华轿车的嘟嘟声，阿尔格斯• 格林斯彭艺术廊的时尚开幕式上，一种更简朴端庄的打扮正在流行。

sentences.en: Connie kissed Carlo good - bye when he put her in the limousine.
sentences.cn: 当卡罗送康妮上车时,她也只好同他吻别了.

sentences.en: He began to insist upon a bullet-proof limousine, just for peace of mind.
sentences.cn: 他开始坚持要防弹豪华轿车，仅仅是为了安心而已。

sentences.en: He prefers travelling on the Tube to riding in a limousine.
sentences.cn: 他更愿意乘地铁出行，不愿坐豪华轿车。

sentences.en: In 1992, George Bush visited Australia and, from the window of his limousine, held up his index and middle fingers in the "V" shape, a la Winston Churchill.
sentences.cn: 1992年，乔治·布什拜访澳大利的时候，效仿温斯顿·丘吉尔，从豪华的轿车里伸出食指和中指作出“V”字形的手势。

sentences.en: In one driveway a chauffeur wearing rubber boots was hosing down a limousine.
sentences.cn: 其中一条私人车道上，一位穿着橡胶靴的专职司机正用水管冲洗一辆豪华轿车。

sentences.en: She got a limousine by herself.
sentences.cn: 她靠自己的努力得到了一辆豪华轿车.

sentences.en: She has a chauffeur - driven limousine.
sentences.cn: 她有一辆由私人司机开的豪华轿车.

sentences.en: Supervisors in this unit group supervise and co-ordinate activities of truck drivers, bus drivers, delivery drivers, subway and other transit operators, chauffeurs and taxi and limousine drivers.
sentences.cn: 本单元组主管监督和协调卡车司机，巴士司机，送货司机，地铁及其他交通营办商，司机，出租车和豪华轿车司机的活动。

sentences.en: The dilatory limousine came rolling up the drive.
sentences.cn: 那辆姗姗来迟的大型轿车沿着汽车道开了上来.

sentences.en: The foreign visitors rolled up to the hotel in a limousine.
sentences.cn: 外宾们乘着一辆轿车来到旅馆.

sentences.en: The limousine moved off through the gates of the mall.
sentences.cn: 轿车开动了,出了林荫道的大门.

sentences.en: The limousine sped off down the road in the proverbial cloud of dust.
sentences.cn: 豪华轿车沿公路飞驰而去，那真是卷起一路风尘。

sentences.en: We arrived in fine style in a hired limousine.
sentences.cn: 我们很气派地乘坐出租的豪华汽车到达那里.

sentences.en: When Summers travelled by limousine or airplane, Sandberg gave up her seat next to him to make sure that other officials and staffers got time with the boss.
sentences.cn: 当萨默斯乘坐豪华轿车或飞机时，桑德伯格会放弃紧挨着他的位置，留给别的官员和职员与这位老板接触的时间。

phrases.tran_cn: 服务客车；豪华轿车服务

trans.tran_cn: 豪华轿车，大型豪华轿车，接送旅客的交通车
trans.tran_en: a very large, expensive, and comfortable car, driven by someone who is paid to drive
